channel.title: Compiler Problems
channel.description:
Hey I Got This Compiler Problem It's Maybe Java And Help Me As Soon As Possible Please.Thank You
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2zovupi.jpg[/img]

item.title: Compiler Problems
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

that one works fine for me, [ps is the compile.bat where all you server files are] ?
Did you set up CLASSPATH/PATH?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problems

item.title: Compiler Problems
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“oswaldpkz, post:3, topic:235359”]This Is What It says But I Do Have Java.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/quote]
You need JDK [needed to compile java]

Read full topic

item.description:
@oswaldpkz wrote:

This Is What It says But I Do Have Java.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

item.title: Compiler Problems
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The compiler most likely has the wrong version set to it. Right click on the batch file, click edit, and change it to your java version.

Read full topic
